item.description:
This is Guiffrida Park in Meriden, CT.

We'll go up along Lamentation and loop back around, then come up the "easy" way to the top of Chauncey and come down the uber-steep way. Lots of good views and up and down here.

Starting time: 10:30am on Saturday
Meeting place: Guiffrida Park parking lot
Estimated distance time out: ~5M, ~3-4H
Leader: Adam Skinner

Weather should be very nice for hiking. Don't forget water and sunscreen!

Park info & directions: PDF
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet at the parking lot near the reservoir.
